name: LJG Digital
description:
LJG Digital is an interactive design agency located in San Diego, CA. We conceive, design, develop, produce and manage digital marketing and communications campaigns that are both stylistically ambitious and meticulously targeted.                   
                                                            By combining decades of communications strategy experience with up-to-the-moment proficiency in mobile technologies, web design, motion graphics, 3D and VR, ultra-high definition video and augmented reality, LJG Digital can generate precise, audience-specific, collateral material all under one roof. Our team encompasses strategists, writers, programmers, graphic designers and animators, each with an acute awareness of the exponential pace at which the electronic media are evolving.
 
With eyes wide open to the possibilities that the internet and newer, more nimble digital media production techniques could yield for business, LJG opened up shop in 1994. Today, many of our very first clients are still with us. By always putting our clients’ ambitions first and taking every measure to meet or exceed them, we have consistently stayed ahead of the technological curve. As the media landscape changes, so does our capacity to accommodate our clients’ changing needs. This is why they have kept coming back to us, year after year.
